campaign.title: Campaign Worksheet
campaign.noActs: No acts to display. Click below to add some!

focus.protect: To protect [place, idea, culture, person, thing]
focus.deliver: To deliver [person, thing] to [place, culture, person]

items.not-allowed: This Item type cannot be added to this Actor.

moves.none: No Moves have been added. Drag some from the Item sidebar or compendium.

condition.none: No Conditions have been added. Drag some from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

status.title: Statuses
status.none: No Statuses have been added. Drag some from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

techniques.title: Techniques
techniques.none: No Techniques have been added. Drag some from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

feature.title: Playbook Feature
feature.none: No Playbook Feature has been added. Drag one from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

moment-of-balance.title: Moment of Balance
moment-of-balance.none: No Moment of Balance has been added. Drag one from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

question.title: Growth Questions
question.none: No Growth Questions have been added. Drag some from the Item sidebar or compendium.

advancement.title: Growth Advancements
advancement.playbook-move: Take a new move from your playbook
advancement.other-move: Take a new move from another playbook
advancement.raise-stat: Raise a stat by +1 (maximum of +2 to any stat)
advancement.shift-center: Shift your Center by one step

principle.title: Principle
principle.none: No NPC Principle has been added. Drag one from the Item sidebar or a compendium.

roll.with: Roll with {name}
roll.evade-observe: Clear 1-fatigue & roll with Creativity or Harmony

dialog.bonus-description: Total of Forwards, Ongoing and Helping {bonusesAppliedMessage}

roll.no-actor: You cannot roll Moves without an assigned Actor.

approach.full:
Choose one from this list:

  • Mark 1-fatigue to use a learned technique
  • Use one practiced technique
  • Use two different basic or mastered techniques
approach.miss: You stumble, but you can shift your balance away from center to use one basic technique.

SETTINGS.None: There are no settings for Avatar Legends RPG (Unofficial)

tabbedPlayerSheet.label: Tabbed Player Sheet
tabbedPlayerSheet.hint: Display the player character sheet with tabbed layout

sheetColour.label: Sheet Color
sheetColour.hint: The color scheme used by Player character sheets
